message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm happy to offer it for $20,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? This would be a fair price considering the product's benefits for you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $14,000. Can we discuss further?
Bob, you're getting closer! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we split the difference and settle at $15,500? This would be a win-win for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $15,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $13,500. Can we make a deal?
Bob, I appreciate your offers, but I've already got another buyer ready to pay $15,000.  I'd prefer to work with you, but I need to be realistic.  Is there any way you can meet me at $14,500?
I understand you've got another buyer, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $13,000. Can we make a deal?
